Courses

Notes that build from foundations to advanced practice

6 focused tracks. Each track has a clear path from foundations to advanced practice, plus a summary with games and practical tools.

Track your CPDOpen the labs
Need evidence for work or accreditation? Open the CPD evidence view.

Learning flow

  • Clear intent and scope
  • Data clarity (front matter + MDX)
  • Application guardrails (React/Next)
  • Technology controls (headers, client-side tools)

Browser-native courses, tools, labs, and games built to stay readable, calm, and offline-capable. Clear inputs, clear outputs, and no hidden mechanics.
